attributes.title: MY DOOR FELL OFF
attributes.review: When I opened the app my door fell off the hinges and fell on my dog causing him to release gas into my moms face and my mom dropped her pot of hot grease onto my brothers legs and he dropped his lit candle which caused the whole house to burn down... now I’m homeless NEVER GET THIS APP ITS ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE AND WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE FOREVER.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: There are so many bugs in this app and it seems like whenever I try to find an even near me I can’t!!!! Awful awful awful!

attributes.title: TRUMP 2020!!!
attributes.review: Beautiful app layout and works FLAWLESSLY!!! Can’t wait to join the FIGHT... Stay safe and keep America GREAT!!!

attributes.title: 🧚‍♂️
attributes.review: this app is just horrible! me and my younger brother saw it and he saw things nobody should see 😭. we can’t unsee what we saw on this app and i can’t believe that this is an app on this store 🤡 i thought it was a safe place to look at apps but i’m disgusted 😈 now we’re having to explain to him why he saw a disgusting cheeto on the screen 🤢 don’t let the children see this monstrosity of an app 😭

attributes.title: Requires Google Translate??
attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with the devil himself but when I tried to use it everything was in Russian?? I don’t understand why it’s not in English or what Trump has to do with Russia but....

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: This app shows a disgusting orange cheeto named “dOnAlD j TrUmP.” This cheeto is disgusting. It hurts and scars young children and destroyed our country and our peple. This cheeto is 𝙙𝙞𝙨𝙜𝙪𝙨𝙩𝙞𝙣𝙜. I recommend you to get this app and rate this app a low review and make it go under one star.

attributes.title: Maga
attributes.review: I usually love feeling like I’m part of the trump cult and will do anything to make me feel closer to Trump. This app did not enhance my feeling of belonging to Trump. I would NEVER go against anything Trump, but this app didn’t do my great leader justice

attributes.title: Bunker boy needs a diaper change
attributes.review:
Little bunker boy’s servants forgot to change his diaper 😪😪 he’s walking around with a full diaper and crying about it because he can’t go out and get another spray tan lets all pray for Donny poo

attributes.title: This app is bad
attributes.review: I love love apps but this one is just bad it starts to say that Russia and America are married and that trump is in love with mike pence and that they got married it is also hard to set up account don’t download

attributes.title: 🧚‍♂️🍄✨
attributes.review: In today’s episode of generational cyberbullying we are working on getting propaganda from a racist and rapist who someone let have a voice off of the App Store. Stay tuned for more episodes.
